name: Invatris (CyberStarLight)
description:
This is a mash up of Invaders, Tetris, and Breakout.  Made for Mini Ludum Dare, with a mash-up theme.

Use your ship to shoot down tetris parts and fill up lines. Use your ball to regain energy and weaken enemies.

Music:

"Kick Shock" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
